sec.p: Three spray formulations containing M. officinalis oil (France) and 3,7-dimethyl-2,6-octadienal, respectively, in 5 mL plastic containers with a pump spray nozzle (Uncleg, Hwaseong) were prepared, to determine the effective acaricidal products (Supplementary Table S2) for the control of Dermatophagoides spp. Single spray applications of 0.25, 0.5, and 1% concentrations of the M. officinalis oil and 3,7-dimethyl-2,6-octadienal preparations delivered ca. 2.11, 4.22 and 8.44 µg/cm 2 of total material to a filter paper (5.5 cm i.d. × 25 μm thickness, Whatman, Maidstone, UK), respectively.
